post.body: thanks! We were really happy with it!
and @DrFun I want to see that smoking jacket
you better watch out tonight.
are you nervous about tonight's big opening?
so quiet!
Our main website is down... for tickets, you can go to http://bit.ly/2kD9
BTW, LunarPages is AWFUL. Their hosting = disaster for your company.
Our main website is down... for tickets, you can go to http://bit.ly/2kD9
Yes, the snow keeps coming, but the show goes on! "A Christmas Carol" and the Bucky show still a go this afternoon :-)
Rain, snow, sleet, ice: the show will go on! http://tinyurl.com/69lozy
Aw! I love it when our shows touch people's hearts http://tinyurl.com/6y8frm
the show must go on! http://tinyurl.com/69lozy
Need a spectacular gift? Try an awesome theatre course http://tinyurl.com/6ohrkh
Still good seats to Christmas Carol this weekend. Did you get yours yet?
Ok, now I can have a Christmas Present! http://tinyurl.com/5pw4qj
Now we're on television http://tinyurl.com/5efvjr
It's official A Christmas Carol is "Better than Television." http://tinyurl.com/6y4cbd
is it too early for a Christmas Present? http://tinyurl.com/5pw4qj
yeah, yeah, a messed up tweet... here's that ticket URL http://tinyurl.com/5latk2
PCS website having a holiday hiccup.... but you can still get tickets to "A Christmas Carol" here!http://tickets.pcs.org/buytickets/
nearly 400 hardy Dickens fans enjoyed the matinee today...from the magical stage snow inside, to the real thing outside. How many tonight?
Making "A Christmas Carol" even more magical -- snow! Performances on Dec .20 going on as planned. Hope to see you at the theater!
don't wanna drive in the snow? PCS is right on the streetcar line.
the show must go on! A christmas Carol will go on tonight
thank you to all who braved the elements yesterday and joined us for our shows! we appreciate it!
Are you excited about Apollo yet? You should be http://tinyurl.com/9t3r48
Happy New Year everyone! 7 days to lift off! www.pcs.org
RT @FakeScrooge TONITE First 12 folks to donate toiletries & underoos get in FREE to A Christmas Carol. http://bacn.me/jp
Cabin fever cure! good seats available tonight and tomorrow night for "A Christmas Carol." Check out the rush tickets for $10...www.pcs.org
Such happy faces in the matinee!
Yes, "A Christmas Carol" still on for today! Two performances, come on down...www.pcs.org
Wow. It's nasty out there now. Matinee was great, but we're cancelling tonight. No Christmas Carol at 7:30. Exchange your tickets for later!
Portlanders CAN take it! 300 attended "A Christmas Carol" tonight, mid-snowpocalypse...thank you.
there's this genius with a beard...haunts the halls at PCS...saved the day today, the website lives!
